import { LineBreak } from "./recomendations.styles"; const lineBreak = '
' const recomendations = { Underweight: `
This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page.
Hopefully everything works out for you! Have a beautiful day!
`, Healthy: ` This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. \n Hopefully everything works out for you! Have a beautiful day! `, Overweight: `
This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page.
Hopefully everything works out for you! Have a beautiful day!
`, Obese: ` This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. \n Hopefully everything works out for you! Have a beautiful day! ` } export default recomendations;
